text:
Short film script draft ( Aa janta naduma):

AA Janta Naduma……

< Hero voice in background without face exposure 

Hero : Prema , ishq , kaadal , Mohabatth , love ….. ila prathi language lo kuda ee word ki oo space undhi… boothulu ki eppudyna intha perfect
translation chusara….. undadhu.. very premium feeling andi idhi (sarcasm) 

Prema ante headache ani okaru 
adhi oka responsibility ee age lo enduku ani inkokaru
preminchalante maturity undali ani mariokaru
deep fry aipoindhi brain… ivanni vini 

Na jeevitham oka terichina pusthakam andi .. actual ga grandham anali .. enno complicated feelings anni pack chesi perfect ga untayi…okkasari chaduvutha..
Chustu vinandi..😉


Location : Hero home , Hero entrance , Camera goes from downstairs to up following Gayatri…
< Gayatri knocks the door in which hero is still sleeping 🛏 😴 💤 

Gayatri : Rey… Annaya….

< Now background music starts (Oppo reno 2) .. 
< Baground VOICE : General ga naku Alarms nacchavandi… Natural ga levadam antene istam .. anduke roju twaraga 10 ki legustha..
< Hero opens his eyes and look at his mobile for the time…  {10:20}…. he then rushes to the bathroom , put the brush in his mouth with foam surrounded , and calls his friend to wait outside so that he can reach the college ….

 Hero : 5 min lo unta .. bike tho ready ga undu …
 H friend : Rey… Manaki sem holidays ra …
 Hero : oh..!
H friend : Adhi kadhu gaani….!
< Cuts the call , throws his brush and falls on the bed with the  paste foam in mouth…

<After sometime {12 :13} he comes down from his room to the refrigerator for water 💧 the situation is a bit serious out there.. hero winks at Gayatri (tom and jerry music) and walks upstairs . Gayatri follows and call him.

Gayatri : Annaya…

< HERO TURNS BACK

Hero : yes…!

Gayatri : eroju nee results ra..
< hero slips on the floor …

Hero : oh..! (LOOKS DOWNSTAIRS) Na kosamena mounam paatistunnaru..
         : Subjects yemyna poyaya…

Gayatri : 🤨
Hero : (Gasps..!)  Enni pass ayya…
Gayatri : 🤨
Hero : Kaneesam Drawing aina …..?
Gayatri : Mm hmm.. Ledhu..

< Hero getting scolded ….

background sound : Ee thitlu kottha em kadhu … kaani ee sari kottha kottha thitlu vinnanu… But sometimes you need to be shameless in life..😉
kaani edhi aythe adhi ayyindi ani Aa roju open aipoya..

Hero : Nenu Director avudhamani anukuntunna….

< Hero mother drops a vessel..

Hero : Naku 1 year time Kavali … telusu (low voice) passion , aim rendu veru ani.. kaani na passion inka aim rendu okate….

< complete silence … Hero father walks away, also mother ..

……………………………..

< Hero with his friends 

Hero F1 : Enti cheppesava….!
Hero F2 : Aithe intlo nundi bayataki gentesara..?

 < Hero slaps him (f2) 

Hero : Silent ga vellipoyaru….
Hero F3 : Aithe inkem… oppukunnatte…
Hero F2 : Nenu cheppindhi vinu … maryada ga ollu daggira pettukoni intlo panulu anni chesey…. Konchem vinayam natinchu…
Hero F1 : One year lo ela prove chestav.. Short film emyna plan chestunnava…..
Hero : Anukuntunna okati… 
Hero F1 : Title enti 
Hero : Aa Janta Naduma…
Hero F2 : Naduma…..! 

< Hero slaps him (f2)

Hero : Nadumu kadhu Naduma .. Anthe madhyana ani… Twaralo modhalu pedadham…


< Gayatri goes to the market …. buys something .. leaves the purse somewhere.. (Niha entrance) . NIHA gives the purse back. And when Niha has no change Gayatri hepls her to pay the bill….

Niha : Thank you… (smiles)

Gayatri : you too... I’m Shwetha ..
Niha : Aadhya… Aadhya Ramakrishnan 
Gayatri : Tamil aa?
Niha : Ama…(Yes)..

<After paying her bill…

Gayatri : Ma illu ikkade….. Coffee?

< While hero is slicing the onions 🧅 that fast so that it might cut the finger . At the last slice , niha enters..
Hero : Something entered my house
Gayatri : Amma…. Tinu aadhya …. 
amma : MEERU matladuthu undandi
Gayatri : Orey…
NIha : Tammuda..?
Gayatri: Orey Annaya
Niha : oo
Gayatri : Ma frnd occhindhi ra..
Hero : ee 6th class daaniki oo frnd .daanini chusi nenu murisipovali..
<Hero turns his face and get impressed by seeing her
 	ma
<  , Amma prepares coffee ☕️ .

 Gayatri : mee house ekkada…
Niha : hostel lo untunnanu. food bagodhu kada .. so cook chesukudam ani groceries kosam market lo..
Gayatri : Aythe neeku veeluainappdu ma intiki lunch ki ravocchu..
Hero: (Avunu mari.. idhi vandala saavala!)

<hero comes and shakes her hand standing bend>
Niha : Em chestuntaru…
<hero slowly sits>
hero : B-tech ….. complete ayyindhi..
NIha : oh! Nice ..(Holds coffee in hand)
NIha : M.s , m tech plan chesstunnara..
Hero : (smooth smile)..Alantidhe..
Gayatri : Annaya.. Monna results..
Hero : chelli amma pilustundhi ninnu…
Gayatri : (slowly) Sare..
Hero : actual ga Script writing , direction ante interest
Niha  : oh ! nice 
<Both smiles at each other..>

< time : 8:00 ,  hero tries to write a new script … but he gets no new idea .. walks to the terrace , hear a song from Kavya..couldn't figure out who it was…
>
< Holi… time )(Need some dialogues here)
< Heroine suddenly scribble holi colour on hero ’s face…. , so the next day .. hero reaches her on that point . 

< Herione needs a bag in this scene and a t-shirt and jeans .. 

< hero folllows her  Suddenly she comes back and…

 Swarna : Ninna colour raaasinananduku follow avutunnav kada…
 Arjun : …!
 Swarna : Proposal aa..?
 Arjun : Mee gurinchi purtiga teliyakunda propose ela chesta..
 SWarna : Mari follow enduku avutunnav..
 Arjun : Mmmm…..Coffee taguthu Matladudhama...
 
< At Coffee shop

Swarna : cheppu 
Arjun : Capachino with almond milk..
Swarna : order cheppamanaledhu… enduku follow chestunnav….adhi..?
 Arjun : adha….! Konthamandhi chudagane nacchutaru .. andulo chala konthamandhi manaki friends avutharu…. friends circle undatam manchidhe  kada aa…… aa circle lo mimmalni kuda  add cheddamani..
  Swarna : So friendship kosam antav…
 Arjun : Exactly…
Swarna : Friendship taruvatha love ante ..
 Arjun : Nakanna mundhu meere propose Cheste.?
 Swarna :  Anduke … ee talanoppi antha enduku cheppu….
 Arjun : Life plain ga velte em baavuntadhi cheppu…(cheppandi ).. Aina nene edho force ga convince chestunnattu undi………... k then it was meeting you.. b(ye)..
Swarna : Swarna …(opens her hand for shake…
                shake hand icchinappudu teesukovadam manners telusa.…
Arjun : teesukunte vadalanu mari….. Arjun..

  < Shake hands with each other……..
 < confuses with milk coffee and Black coffee>
Arjjun : Boyfriend unara…?
Swarna : nope…(drinking something )..neeku..?
Arjun : cha.. cha naku boyfriends evaru Leru..
swarna : (spills)

Swarna : em chestu untaru meeru…
< scene cuts here
  
at the end.. Continuation;

Arjun : Director avvadam dream…


(Need dialogues)
 
( niha and hero scene…)

< hero walks out of his room and sooner niha enters into it , looks around , and hero walks in…>

Niha : Ou… ! Hello..
arjun : hi…!
Niha : Shwetha Rammannadhi…
Arjun : hmm… tanadhi pakka room..
Niha : oh…!
<Starts walking>

Arjun :Aina ……... Chelli intlo Ledhu…
Niha : avna..!(accent).   <checks her phone>
            Call chesindhi… rammani..(low voice)

Arjun : yeah… Vacchestadhi….. please(shows his hand to sit ) 
            < niha sits on the bed.. he grabs a chair.>
            < she finds plenty of  papers next to her >
Niha : Enti ivanni…

Ajun : Actually naku direction ante intrest .. so 
Nha : oh.. script papers aa ..(enthusiastically).. Nice..
Arjun : yyyeaah
NIha : enni movie scripts ivi..
arjun : oka short film vi..
Niha : oh...
Arjun : so.. Aaadhya ,  aadhya Ramakrishnan.. tamil
<untill then she looks at the paper.. slowly lifts her head and smile>
Niha : yes.
Arjun : tamil ….ela nerchukunedhi..
Niha : oka manchi tamil friend unte nechukovocchu..
<stands up wALKS TO THE DOOR>
Arjun : Naku nerchukovali ani undi...
< Comes closer and slowly..>
NIha : first Telugu nerchuko… script lo anni pacchi buthulu unnayi..
Arjun : OU..!
<here rings his mobile..>
Arjun : one moment...aa cheppu .. ha ikkade undi.. .. shwetha..
<gives her the phone>
Niha  : Ha shweta, ha...vastunnam
<cuts the call>
niha : temple daggara undhi anta .. rammantundhi..
Arjun : Temple ka.. NO way..
